column2: Aniki no Yome-san nara, Ore ni Hamerarete Hiihii Itteru Tokoro Da yo

Two respected older brothers. Two beautiful, virtuous wives. The younger brother, a horndog who salivates at the chance to taste those wives.

(Source: DLsite)
['Aniki no Yomesan nara, Ore ni Hamerarete Hiihii Itteru Tokoro da yo']
